name: Enemy Engaged: RAH-66 Comanche vs. KA-52 Hokum
name_original: Enemy Engaged: RAH-66 Comanche vs. KA-52 Hokum
description:
Enemy Engaged: RAH-66 Comanche vs. KA-52 Hokum is a simulation game developed by Razorworks. It came out on 01-03-2000. It was published by Empire Interactive Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Enemy Engaged: RAH-66 Comanche vs. KA-52 Hokum has a score of 86.
You can play Enemy Engaged: RAH-66 Comanche vs. KA-52 Hokum on PC.
